bug.summary: non-str key in hparam dict causes exception in logging
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
The _flatten_dict function in LightningLoggerBase assumes that dicts will only have string keys. Passing a hparam like {2:3} will break it. <denchmark-h:h2>Please reproduce using the BoringModel</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1qN5oIzPcH18QSZhAMy9N-YDkeDkc4-fy>https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1qN5oIzPcH18QSZhAMy9N-YDkeDkc4-fy</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Use following <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1HvWVVTK8j2Nj52qU4Q4YCyzOm0_aLQF3?usp=sharing>BoringModel</denchmark-link> and post here <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
It should cast to str before logging <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
